snippet: After announcing it would not bid for the 2022 Games, a cautious United States Olympic Committee said it will take its time studying whether to bid for the 2024 Summer and 2026 Winter Games.
abstract: United States Olympic Committee says it will not bid to host the Winter Games in 2022, but will study whether to bid for the 2024 Summer Games and the 2026 Winter Games.
lead_paragraph: After announcing it would not bid for the 2022 Games, a cautious United States Olympic Committee said it will take its time studying whether to bid for the 2024 Summer and 2026 Winter Games.

headline.seo: U.S.O.C. Pulls Out of Bidding for 2022 Games Before It Begins
headline.main: U.S. Olympic Committee Pulls Out of Bidding for 2022 Games Before It Begins
headline.print_headline: Cautious U.S.O.C. Won’t Bid for 2022 Games
